title: MAXIMIZE Your Urban Farm Yields with These Proven Strategies!

tasks.task: Expose urban farming hacks for high yield
subtasks: Explain container gardening with deep, wide containers
Describe companion planting techniques (e.g., tomatoes and basil)
Promote vertical farming using walls and fences
Encourage mulching to retain soil moisture and control weeds
Suggest natural pest control methods (e.g., ladybugs)
Emphasize crop rotation to maintain soil health

tasks.task: Encourage engagement with likes and subscriptions
subtasks: Prompt viewers to like the video
Incentivize viewers to subscribe to the channel
